comment:
* Holds all the relevant data needed to render a Smartspace card with the default Ui Template. *
    *
  • title_text (may contain a start drawable)
    • *
  • subtitle_text (may contain a start drawable) . supplemental_subtitle_text (may * contain a start drawable)
    • * *
  • supplemental_text (contain a start drawable) . do_not_disturb_view
    • * Or *
  • next_alarm_text (contain a start drawable) + supplemental_alarm_text . * do_not_disturb_view
    • *
* * @hide

variables.name: mTemplateType
variables.comment:
* {@link UiTemplateType} indicating the template type of this template data.
     *
     * @see UiTemplateType

variables.name: mPrimaryItem
variables.comment:
* Title text and title icon are shown at the first row. When both are absent, the date view
     * will be used, which has its own tap action applied to the title area.
     *
     * Primary tap action for the entire card, including the blank spaces, except: 1. When title is
     * absent, the date view's default tap action is used; 2. Subtitle/Supplemental subtitle uses
     * its own tap action if being set; 3. Secondary card uses its own tap action if being set.

variables.name: mSubtitleItem
variables.comment: Subtitle text and icon are shown at the second row.

variables.name: mSubtitleSupplementalItem
variables.comment:
* Supplemental subtitle text and icon are shown at the second row following the subtitle text.
     * Mainly used for weather info on non-weather card.

variables.name: mSupplementalLineItem
variables.comment: * Supplemental line is shown at the third row.

variables.name: mSupplementalAlarmItem
variables.comment:
* Supplemental alarm item is specifically used for holiday alarm, which is appended to "next
     * alarm". This is also shown at the third row, but won't be shown the same time with
     * mSupplementalLineItem.

variables.name: mLayoutWeight
variables.comment:
* The layout weight info for the card, which indicates how much space it should occupy on the
     * screen. Default weight is 0.

methods.name: public int getTemplateType()
methods.comment: Returns the template type. By default is UNDEFINED.

methods.name: public SubItemInfo getPrimaryItem()
methods.comment: Returns the primary item (the first line).

methods.name: public SubItemInfo getSubtitleItem()
methods.comment: Returns the subtitle item (the second line).

methods.name: public SubItemInfo getSubtitleSupplementalItem()
methods.comment: Returns the subtitle's supplemental item (the second line following the subtitle).

methods.name: public SubItemInfo getSupplementalLineItem()
methods.comment: Returns the supplemental line item (the 3rd line).

methods.name: public SubItemInfo getSupplementalAlarmItem()
methods.comment: Returns the supplemental alarm item (the 3rd line).

methods.name: public int getLayoutWeight()
methods.comment: Returns the card layout weight info. Default weight is 0.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
